components.name: TiAPI
components.description: This component is used for cross-platform API work. Specifications are most likely to use this component.

fields.description: Define cross platform API points for padding and margin control for text fields and areas.  Once parity discussion is completed, platform specific implementation tickets should be created.
fields.summary: TiAPI:  implement cross platform padding and margin control on text fields and areas
